instruction: Suggest a plausible narrative for a short story about a woman discovering her inner-strength.
output: The short story is about a woman called June who has always been afraid to take risks and make changes in her life. Despite her fear, she embarks on a journey exploring her passions. She meets people, takes up different jobs, and tries out hobbies. Along the way, she notices that the old doubts and insecurities start to slip away. She starts to develop a newfound passion and confidence within her. Things become easier and she starts to feel more in control. Finally, when she feels ready, she musters up the courage to pursue a career that she had never even thought was possible for her. June finds the strength within her she never knew she had, thus beginning her new life journey.
